content_rendered:
function code62($x) {
$show = '';
while ( $x > 0 ) {
$s = $x % 62;
if ($s > 35) {
$s = chr ( $s + 61 );
} elseif ($s > 9 && $s <= 35) {
$s = chr ( $s + 55 );
}
$show .= $s;
$x = floor ( $x / 62 );
}
return $show;
}

function shorturl($url) {
$url = crc32 ( $url );
$result = sprintf ( "%u", $url );
return code62($result);
}
